name: Pog &Lewis
description:
Pitch

Pog & Lewis is a 2D pixel art game where the player takes the role of Pog, a small ball-shaped creature looking for a gold nugget in a maze.

This project is under development. Do not hesitate to say what you think of this game!

Credits
  • Chil : Developper, Game Designer
  • CrashCan : 2D Artist, Game Designer
  • Drimnas : Developper, Game Designer
  • Vortex : Level Designer, Game Designer
